sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function Item({ item, value }) { const { id, title, img, price, total, count } = item; const { increment, decrement, removeItem } = value; return (
product : {title}
product : {price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
removeItem(id)}>
item total : $ {total}
); }
